titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress that the Secretary of Health and Human Services should administratively provide for coverage under the Medicare Program of backup systems for durable medical equipment in the case of a power failure.

bill.summary: 8/2/2001--Introduced. Expresses the sense of Congress that the Secretary of Health and Human Services should administratively provide for coverage under the Medicare program under title XVIII of the Social Security Act (SSA) of appropriate backup systems for items of durable medical equipment in the case of a power failure.
